DOC.brief_summary: Janssen Inc. plan collect data 3000 5000 infliximab infusion per year , start third quarter 2005 . It expect 12 site Remicade Infusion Network ( R.I.N . ) participate . This registry multicentre , prospective , observational program gather analyze data subject treat infliximab .
DOC.criteria: Subject good candidate receive infliximab per Product Monograph Subject prescribe infliximab appropriate physician Subject receive infusion community infusion centre . Subject sign approved consent form . Not specify protocol
